item.description:
Contact Christine McGilvray at 617-312-5128 or snowflakeregatta2011@gmail.com for more details and Sailing (oops, Skiing) Instructions

 

﻿﻿﻿Captain's Meeting the Friday evening before

at Tuckerman's Bar & Restaurant

336 Rt 16A Intervale, NH Tel: 603-356-5541

 

Meet in main lodge at 9:00 AM / Annual Snowflake Regatta @ Attitash Mountain NH

 

  http://www.attitash.com/

 

 

The Snowflake Regatta is a fun day on the ski slopes with all your summer sailing and power boating friends. So gather your crew to race a “Giant Slalom NASTAR Type” course – and remember
– it’s okay to snowplow! (Snowboarders welcome)


PHRF, One design, cruising and power boat classes
are welcome! Crews can organize without the captain. Individuals can organize without a team!

This is a day to enjoy with your Summer Friends!!


Race in the morning and free ski in afternoon. The awards party will follow in the main lodge with appetizers, beer and wine.

 http://www.attitash.com/

 

 

﻿

﻿﻿

 

﻿
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in main lodge at 9:00 AM / Annual Snowflake Regatta @ Attitash Mountain NH
item.name: Annual Snowflake Regatta @ Attitash Mountain NH
